Package com.ashtonit.odb

Contains the classes used to manage an OrientGraph pool in a web application.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OdbFilter
    This class is responsible for obtaining an OrientGraph instance from OrientGraphPool and setting it as an attribute on the request object.
    OdbSessionListener
    Because OrientGraph instances always have an associated user, instances for a user who has logged out can clog up the OrientGraph pool.
    Version
    This interface adds a version string to public OdbRealm classes.

Package com.ashtonit.odb Description

Contains the classes used to manage an OrientGraph pool in a web application.

OdbFilter takes care of obtaining an OrientGraph instance from the pool at the start of a request and releasing it again at the end of request processing.

OdbSessionListener cleans up pooled instances associated with a user when that user logs out.

Author:
Bruce Ashton
